MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA15 postcode area of Beith, affecting properties in Main Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:34am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect most supplys to be restored by 5pm & for the remainder of customers we will work to get the supply restored by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:54pm on the 8th of January 2021.
